Name: Helmsplitter
Description: A powerful sword strike from above.

Name: Trinity Slice
Description: Rapidly slash an opponent three times.

Name: Arc Slash
Description: A wide swing striking a row of opponents.

Name: Siege Breaker
Description: Boosts all damage output at lower health. +5% at <50% hp, +10 at <25%, +15% at <12.5%.

Name: Frost Edge
Description: Increase chance of critical hit by 15% for 2 turns.

Name: Mordstreich
Description: Jump into the air for a deadly sword thrust.

Name: Riser
Description: Jumping sword strike. Knocks opponent upward. 60% chance to decrease enemy's defense.

Name: Rally
Description: Boost physical attack for the entire team.

Name: Gold Soul
Description: Boost stats of entire team slightly.
